attributes.action: Make it a legal requirement for social care workers to wear body cameras
attributes.additional_details: I believe a lot of reports are made that are not true and false allegations that can cause massive distress to families or the worker I feel the cameras worn would protect all involved from any false allegations
attributes.background: Make. Or a legal requirement for social care workers to wear body camera same as police to protect both them and clients from false allegations

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition which calls for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/642231
